project_descr: Seeks to address the solid waste management challenges in the country by strengthen the capacities for solid waste management, improve the solid waste management facilities and greater public awareness on solid waste management.

outputs.output_descr: The capacities of municipal and other local government bodies strengthened to improve solid waste management
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr: Solid waste management facilities in selected townships and NDCs improved
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr: Greater awareness among the public about good solid waste management practices created.
